akn:content.akn:p:
§ 80t–4. Educational and liaison programs(a) Programs authorizedThe Director of the Museum may carry out educational and liaison programs in support of the goals of the Museum.
(b) Collaboration with schoolsIn carrying out this section, the Director shall carry out educational programs in collaboration with elementary schools, secondary schools, and postsecondary schools.
(Pub. L. 116–260, div. T, title I, § 106, Dec. 27, 2020, 134 Stat. 2276.)
(a) Programs authorized The Director of the Museum may carry out educational and liaison programs in support of the goals of the Museum.
(b) Collaboration with schools In carrying out this section, the Director shall carry out educational programs in collaboration with elementary schools, secondary schools, and postsecondary schools.
